keys.LANG_PROCEDURES_DEFNORETURN_TOOLTIP: functie met met geen return waarde
keys.LANG_PROCEDURES_CALLNORETURN_TOOLTIP: functie oproepen met geen return waarde
keys.LANG_PROCEDURES_CALLRETURN_TOOLTIP: functies aanroepen met een return waarde
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_IF_ELSE_TOOLTIP: pak alles conditie voor de 'als blok' toevoegen
keys.LANG_TEXT_CREATE_JOIN_TOOLTIP: Toevoegen, verwijderen, of pas de tekstblok aan
keys.LANG_BLUETOOTH_COMMAND_TOOLTIP: Receive a command through Bluetooth module
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_SETUP_LOOP_TOOLTIP: Blocks in setup will be executed at start, and blocks in Loop will be repeated continously.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_WHILEUNTIL_TOOLTIP_WHILE: While the condition is true, then do the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_WHILEUNTIL_TOOLTIP_UNTIL: While the condition is false, then do the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_FOR_TOOLTIP: Count from a start number to an end number. Each time the count is incremented by one, the variable takes that value then do the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_IF_TOOLTIP_1: If the condition is true, execute the statements.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_BASE_DELAY_TOOLTIP: Waits the specified time in milliseconds (ms)
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_EQ: Checks if both inputs are equal.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_NEQ: Checks if both inputs are different.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LT: Checks if the first input is smaller than the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LTE: Checks if the first input is smaller than or equal to the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GT: Checks if the first input is greater than the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GTE: Checks if the first input is greater than or equal to the second one.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_OPERATION_TOOLTIP_AND: Checks if both inputs are true.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_OPERATION_TOOLTIP_OR: Checks if either inputs are true.
keys.LANG_LOGIC_NEGATE_TOOLTIP: Returns the opposite of the input.
keys.LANG_MATH_BASE_MAP_TOOLTIP: Re-map the input from [0-1023] to another.
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_MATH_RANDOM_TOOLTIP: Returns a random number between the two limits.
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_GET_TOOLTIP: Returns the value of a variable.
keys.LANG_CONTROLS_FOR_LOOP_WARNING5: Moet worden gebruikt in een lusinstructie
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_SET_TOOLTIP: Sets the value of a variable.
keys.LANG_VARIABLES_GLOBAL_TOOLTIP: Declares and defines a GLOBAL variable of type int or String.
keys.LANG_TEXT_TEXT_TOOLTIP: A letter, word, or line of text.
keys.LANG_TEXT_JOIN_TOOLTIP: Create a piece of text by joining together any number of items.
keys.LANG_TEXT_LENGTH_TOOLTIP: Returns number of letters (including spaces) in the provided text.
keys.LANG_TEXT_EQUALSIGNORECASE_TOOLTIP: Checks if both input strings are equal, regardless of the case.
keys.LANG_TEXT_LENGTH_LOWER_TOOLTIP: Retourneert een tekenreeks in kleine letters.
keys.LANG_TEXT_NUMBER_CAST_TOOLTIP: Converts the string into a number
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_ANALOG_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the value from a specified digital pin
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_DIGITAL_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the value from a specified digital pin
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_ANALOG_WRITE_TOOLTIP: Write a value between 0 and 255 to a specific analog output PIN
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_INOUT_DIGITAL_WRITE_TOOLTI: Write a value in a specified digital pin
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_BUILTIN_LED_TOOLTIP: Built-in LED that is internally connected to PIN 13
keys.LANG_BQ_BUTTON_LONG_SHORT_TOOLTIP: Discriminates how long the button is pressed
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_PRINTLN_TOOLTIP: Prints data as ASCII text and adds a Carriage Return (CR).
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_AVAILABLE_TOOLTIP: Check whether the serial port is available or not
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_PARSE_NUMBER_TOOLTI: First valid number from the serial buffer
keys.LANG_ADVANCED_SERIAL_READSTRING_TOOLTIP: Reads incoming serial data from serial port as ASCII text.
keys.LANG_US_TOOLTIP: Returns the distance measured by the ultrasonic sensor.
keys.LANG_US_COLLISION_TOOLTIP: Detects collision or free cases based on a distance threshold with the ultrasonic sensor
keys.LANG_LED_MATRIX_GENERIC_TOOLTIP: Build a generic expression for LED Matrix
keys.LANG_LED_MATRIX_DRAWING_ICONS_TOOLTIP: Icon to show on the LEDs matrix
keys.LANG_LED_MATRIX_DRAWING_TOOLTIP: Joins cols/rows for building an expression for LED Matrix.
keys.LANG_INFRARED_ANALOG_TOOLTIP: Returns the analog value measured by the infrared sensor.
keys.LANG_INFRARED_DIGITAL_TOOLTIP: Returns the digital value measured by the infrared sensor.
keys.LANG_RGB_LED_TOOLTIP: Set a colour on a RGB LED
keys.LANG_SIMPLEEXPRESSIONS_LED_STRIP_TOOLTIP: Sets data for a LED strip pixel
keys.LANG_PIEZO_BUZZER_PREDEF_SOUNDS_TOOLTIP: Plays some basic sounds based on SimpleExpressions library
keys.LANG_PIEZO_BUZZER_MELODY_TOOLTIP: Generates a melody (string with frequencies and durations)
keys.LANG_MUSIC_NOTE_TOOLTIP: Generates a musical note (frequency and duration)
keys.LANG_SERVO_CONT_TOOLTIP: Generates movements with a continuous rotation servo.
keys.LANG_SERVO_DC_MOTOR_TOOLTIP: Generates movements with a DC motor
keys.LANG_TEMP_REQUEST_AND_READ_TEMP_TOOLTIP: Requests and reads the 18B20 temperature sensor in Celsius or Fahrenheit degrees
keys.LANG_HUMID_READ_HUMID_DHT_TOOLTIP: Reads DHT11, DHT21, DHT22 humidity sensor in %
keys.LANG_TEMP_READ_TEMP_DHT_TOOLTIP: Reads the DHT11, DHT21 DHT22 temperature sensor in Celsius degrees
keys.LANG_RAINDROP_ANALOG_TOOLTIP: Reads the quantity of water or rain (from 0 to 1023)
keys.LANG_GAS_ANALOG_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the analog output of a gas sensor
keys.LANG_GAS_DIGITAL_READ_TOOLTIP: Reads the digital output of a gas sensor
keys.LANG_PRESSURE_READ_PRESSURE_BMP_TOOLTIP: Reads barometric pressure from BMP180 sensor in Pa
keys.LANG_TEMP_READ_TEMP_BMP_TOOLTIP: Reads the temperature from BMP180 barometric sensor in Celsius degrees
keys.LANG_ALTITUDE_READ_ALTITUDE_BMP_TOOLTIP: Estimates altitude. If the sea-level pressure is provided the estimation is more accurate. Otherwise, a pressure of 101325 Pa at sealevel it is assumed.
